instructions:
The four columns of roll buttons under skills correspond to the following:

 Blank heading, input your own TN
 nG, use the TN calculated in General on the Roll Information tab
 R, use the TN calculated in Ranged Combat 
 M, use the TN calculated in Melee Combat 

 [Readme&Changelog](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/Shadowrun2e/ReadMe.md)
